name: dark-stone
effect: Summons zekrom for the final battle against N.
short_effect: Summons Zekrom for the final battle against N.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Zekrom’s body was destroyed and
changed into this stone. It is said to
be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
